scripts.package: cd dist && zip function.zip fetchCryptoCurrentPrice.js && cd ..
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run package && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name fetchCryptoCurrentPrice --zip-file fileb://dist/function.zip
scripts.update-handler: aws lambda update-function-configuration --function-name fetchCryptoCurrentPrice --handler index.handler --runtime nodejs20.x
scripts.create-lambda: aws lambda create-function --function-name fetchCryptoCurrentPrice --runtime nodejs20.x --role arn:aws:iam::620833996780:role/lambda-role --handler index.handler --zip-file fileb://dist/function.zip
